meanings.definition: A type of Japanese sword guard
meanings.sent1: The tsubas on samurai swords were often intricately designed.
meanings.sent2: He admired the craftsmanship of the tsubas displayed in the museum.
meanings.sent3: The tsubas on the swords looked like tiny shields protecting the blades.
meanings.sent4: The tsubas gleamed in the sunlight, reflecting the warrior's honor.
meanings.sent5: The intricate patterns on the tsubas told stories of ancient battles.

meanings.definition: The outer part of a bird's wing
meanings.sent1: The tsubas of the eagle helped it soar high in the sky.
meanings.sent2: She marveled at the delicate feathers on the tsubas of the bird.
meanings.sent3: The tsubas of the bird fluttered gracefully in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent4: The tsubas of the bird were like nature's perfect aerodynamic design.
meanings.sent5: The tsubas of the bird caught the sunlight, creating a beautiful display of colors.

meanings.definition: A type of decorative metal fitting on a sword or knife
meanings.sent1: The tsubas on the knife added an elegant touch to its design.
meanings.sent2: He polished the tsubas on the sword to make them shine brightly.
meanings.sent3: The tsubas on the blade jingled softly as he moved.
meanings.sent4: The tsubas on the sword were like tiny pieces of art adorning the weapon.
meanings.sent5: The intricate engravings on the tsubas told the story of the sword's maker.
